DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate antiviral efficacy combination treatment Poly IC Entecavir compare efficacy Entecavir mono-therapy chronic hepatitis B .
DOC.brief_title: Antiviral Efficacy Combination Treatment With Poly IC Entecavir Chronic Hepatitis B
DOC.detailed_description: In study , patient chronic HBV infection divide two group : HBeAg ( + ) HBeAg ( - ) group . Each group divide two subgroup , treat combination treatment Entecavir Poly IC Entecavir monotherapy respectively . All patient follow one year . From study , investigator want study Poly IC enhance antiviral efficacy Entecavir chronic hepatitis B .
DOC.criteria: HBsAg positive 6 month . Having treat wit Entecavir level HBV DNA 1000 copies/ml . ALT ≤10×ULN， TB ＜2ULN . Previous antiviral treatment HBV . Co infection HIV , HCV , HEV , HAV , HAV . Evidence hepatic carcinoma . Evidence autoimmune disease . Evidence thyroid disease . History mental sickness .
